value.name: glance behavior
value.tooltip: how does the speaker of this vocalization direct his gaze?

value.name: glance recipient behavior
value.tooltip: how does someone who hears me behave?

value.name: sound repetition delay
value.tooltip: Minimum delay time between playing the same permutation

value.name: allowable queue delay
value.tooltip: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

value.name: pre voc delay
value.tooltip: How long to wait to actually start the vocalization

value.name: notification delay
value.tooltip: How long into the vocalization the AI should be notified

value.name: post voc delay
value.tooltip: How long speech is suppressed in the speaking unit after vocalizing

value.name: repeat delay
value.tooltip: How long before the same vocalization can be repeated

value.name: weight
value.tooltip: Inherent weight of this vocalization

value.name: speaker freeze time
value.tooltip: speaker won't move for the given amount of time

value.name: listener freeze time
value.tooltip: listener won't move for the given amount of time (from start of vocalization)
